Sentencas: In this study, silicate glass-ceramic is synthesized from wheat straw ash (WSA) using melt-quench technique.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: Xray diffraction is done to confirm the nature of the as-quenched samples.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: Inductive coupled plasma-mass spectroscopy (ICP-MS) and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS) are performed to evaluate the exact chemical composition of the as-prepared samples.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: Similar composition is also melted using conventional mineral oxides for comparison with WSA sample.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: The WSA sample shows good thermal stability in temperature range of 300-900 degrees C.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion (CTE) of WSA sample is more or less in the required range for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) application.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: The powder of WSA derived glass-ceramic is used to form the diffusion couple with the interconnect (Crofer 22 APU) for interfacial study.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: The excellent adhesion with the smooth and porosity-free interface is formed between glass-ceramic and Crofer 22 APU, when WSA is used as a sealant as compared to the mineral based glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: Semi-coherent interface does not show any delimitation or separation even after five thermal cycles.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application

Sentencas: The micro hardness (384 HV) of the interface is indicated good bonding between interconnect and glass-ceramic.
Titulo: Agro-waste ash and mineral oxides derived glass-ceramics and their interconnect study with Crofer 22 APU for SOFC application
